Cursed Weapon Commands: //cw_check - Full Check Reload and Remove CW if some Bugged Usage - //cw_check //cw_info - Show Owners of CW Usage - //cw_info //cw_remove - Remove Cursed Weapon Usage - //cw_remove Akamanah|Zariche //cw_add - Add CW to Char Usage - //cw_add Target Akamanah|Zariche //cw_goto - Go to Character with CW Usage - //cw_goto Akamanah|Zariche //cw_drop - Drop on floor CW Usage - //cw_drop Akamanah|Zariche //cw_reload - Reload Data Usage - //cw_reload Read GM Ban Read GM Skills Read GM Clan Read GM Residence(Castle Edit) Read GM Seven Sing Read GM Olympiad Read GM Cursed Weapons Read GM Zone
